snippet.title: 60 Seconds! Reatomized Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Survivors, your Reatomized shelters open July 25th, 2019 on Steam:
► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1012880

The post-apocalyptic dark comedy is back in 60 Seconds! Reatomized - remastered and even more radioactive than before! An atomic bomb is about to drop and you only get 60 seconds to make it to cover! Bring your family and as many supplies as you can to the safety of a fallout shelter. Make them count! You will need to survive with whoever and whatever you brought, until the rescue comes. Assuming it ever comes at all.

Scavenge supplies, rescue your family and stay alive in your fallout shelter. Make difficult decisions, go on dangerous wasteland expeditions, hunt mutant roaches... and maybe survive. Or not.

60 Seconds! Reatomized
STEAM ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1012880
OFFICIAL TWITTER ► https://twitter.com/60parseconds
OFFICIAL FACEBOOK ► https://www.facebook.com/RG60seconds
 
60 Parsecs!
STEAM ► http://store.steampowered.com/app/646270
OFFICIAL WEBSITE ► http://www.60parsecs.com
OFFICIAL FACEBOOK ► http://www.facebook.com/RG60parsecs
 
Here be robots!
STUDIO WEBSITE ► http://www.robotgentleman.com
STUDIO TWITTER ► http://www.twitter.com/robotgentleman
STUDIO FACEBOOK ► http://www.facebook.com/robotgentleman
STUDIO DISCORD ► https://discord.gg/8pwVJu6
 
Credits:
Production: Robot Gentleman
Directed by Juliusz Zenkner
Writing: Dominik Gotojuch
Music: Michał Ratkowski
Animation: Mateusz Lewicz, Juliusz Zenkner
Compositing: Juliusz Zenkner
Narrator: Duffy Weber
Additional Art: Agata Bednorz, Mateusz Lewicz, Juliusz Zenkner
Additional Sound Design: https://www.freesfx.co.uk/
